title: 108_hr4684
content: Neighbors in Need Act - Amends the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002 (TEUCA) to provide a program extension for States experiencing high unemployment. Amends the Social Security Act to require: (1) increases and decreases in the earnings credited to State accounts when States meet or fail to meet funding goals. And (2) restriction of interest-free advances to State accounts in the Unemployment Trust Fund to States which meet funding goals. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) suspend the tax on individual unemployment compensation for 2004 and 2005. (2) allow certified States to elect to collect Federal unemployment taxes under the Federal Unemployment Tax Act (FUTA). And (3) require States to distribute to unemployed individuals State-specific information packets explaining unemployment insurance eligibility conditions.
